comments:
While testing I ended up running the dropins reconciler while the simpleconfigurator.manipulator was not active (although I'm not sure this is relevant). When I restarted I ended up unable to launch with the following in the error log. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi 4 0 2007-12-09 20:24:50.343
!MESSAGE Startup error
!STACK 1
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The System Bundle's start level can not be modified.
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.StartLevelManager.setBundleStartLevel(StartLevelManager.java:392)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.installBundles(EclipseStarter.java:1085)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.loadBasicBundles(EclipseStarter.java:620)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.startup(EclipseStarter.java:302)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:171)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:561)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:501)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:1239)

Looking at my config.ini I noticed the frameowork bundle was listed in my osgi.bundles where it was set to start. We shouldn't be writing the framework bundle to osgi.bundles since it's the framework itself that does installation using this list.

You are correct this is not supposed to be.
Would you happen to have steps to reproduce that?

This occurred while doing the dropins reconciler integration. The dropins reconciler's Activator now transiently starts exemplarysetup, equinoxframeworkadmin, and simpleconfiguratormanipulator.

In my testing I was running the reconciler on a provisioned sdk with the user ui installed. At the time I did not have the code in the Activator to start the simple configurator manipulator bundle.

--
If you comment out the startup of the Simpleconfigurator manipulator bundle in the dropin reconciler Activator and then cause the reconciler to do an install you will end up with the framework bundle entry in config.ini.

traces.message: The System Bundle's start level can not be modified.
